message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you. Would you like to make an offer or would you like me to give you a price?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, can you do $105?
I can do $105 is a good compromise, but I'd rather get a bit more. How about we meet at $115?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you do $110?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, but I can try to meet you at $115. I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go up to $115, I'll meet you at $112. Can you accept that?
I'm not sure if we're going to meet at a price. I'm willing to go up to $120, but I'm not budging from there. Can you make a serious offer?
I'm not going to go any higher than $110, that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150
